message.body: What are you doing tomorrow night?
staying in a hostel that's like .8 miles from our hotel.
Oh my girl. You gonna be okay?

of course! mom's paying. it's gonna be an adventure! would you believe that i messaged rachael (the ruf girl i've mentioned) about if she knew someone whose couch i could crash on--she looked at the message but never responded.
That's pretty lame. I'm sorry!
made it to atlanta! the calvary people had an extra spot in their girls' room and very generously offered to host me tonight. so awesome!
i am inside the ga dome. woohooooo
Dang girl! I have your bracelet.
i know. did you register it?

i'm here already bc the group had to register some people and i thought i'd just go with them so when they go back to their hotel afterward i can just wait here or maybe marta to our hotel, depending on time.
Ok. Call you in a bit
y'all are going to the hotel first, right? (sorry, just mentally trying to work out logistics)
Yes. Could pick you up if needed
i really doubt you'll need to. getting from here to the hotel via marta shouldn't be hard at all since it's just trains.
last text, i promise! i'm in a diner like half a mile from the hotel, give me 15 minutes warning and i'll meet you at the hotel. :)
K
GPS says 15 min
shweet, gracias.
Did you find the parking garage?
we're waiting to get into it. trafficcc.
Arg..
Parked?
we are in the garage and driving around...pretty sure this lot is full and we're being redirected.
B. One escalator down. At a table.
one down from where?
The main floor
i'm in building b. let me know when you're on your way out/back and i'll meet you.
K. Take a nap. :)
i might!
We are about to be seated. They are opening doors now but it doesn't start for 72 mins. We decided its okay wherever we sit. :) you ok?
i'm good. do you want me to try and get seats? i totally can.
Only if you want. We decided we like 100 lvl best.
hokay. i'll work on that.
Our food is almost out.
did you get it to go? haha.
No. Starting to feel rushed for sure.
well, your seats are safe. good luck!
What direction should we head?
i posted the seats on the groupme. did it go through? look on cass's map for nearest gate.
l18, section 112, row 12, seats 1-9.
Got it!
Did they start yet? We are walking fast.
they're playing a video about last year and like playing along. white flag.
now worship and there is a mariachi trumpet player.
We are in. Almost to you.
found it
Good
i'm so sorry!!! see you soon.
The officer let us in our rooms!
okay, thank god.
I'm in the dome. On lower lvl. But I'm buying the digital download. Be there in a few mins.
no hurry. my scarf is working its magic.
Yay for the magic scarf
